website_summaries.verdict: The Zoom Rize is an excellent team basketball shoe from Nike. These high-tops have all the boxes checked and then some. The traction, cushioning, and materials all work exceptionally well. Everything else—support, lockdown, stability, and containment—works close to perfection. Overall, the Nike Zoom Rize gives the Nike AlphaDunk a run for its money. These high-top basketball shoes perform better on the hardwood and are also a lot cheaper.
pros: These Nike basketball shoes have top-notch traction, nearly all reviewers assert
According to them, the traction pattern provides 360-degree coverage and is hardly affected by dust
Many users observe that the traction seems to be durable enough for outdoor play
The foam midsole feels incredible, most testers declare
They claim that the foam has very good compression, a little bit of bounce, and feels quite plush
According to most owners, the forefoot Zoom unit feels similar to the Nike LeBron 16’s
It is responsive and very stable
The engineered mesh upper is very strong and supportive, almost all testers state
The materials don’t take long to break in, several players remark
It just feels incredible once broken-in
The Nike Zoom Rize’s asymmetrical lacing provides exceptional lockdown, a significant number of testers report
These high-tops have excellent ankle support, some owners note
cons: The traction picks up quite a bit of dust, many testers report
However, they say a quick wipe will do the trick
The Nike Zoom Rize doesn’t have the best court feel, some reviewers gripe

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, very tight
customer_reviews.text: Good aesthetic but very narrow/tight. This shoe has the potential to be comfortable for the right person. I couldn't justify keeping them based on the fit - maybe that's why we don't see them around anymore. I'm ambivalent about the quality and feel of the material; it felt "cheap" in some ways. Again, hard to justify for a $200 price tag. Overall, I still think this is a decent shoe IF it could fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Shoes.... Runs a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: They are alright not really what i expected.... They run small....

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers and arrived in a timely manner
customer_reviews.text: These are Nike sneakers, and for a size 16 were reasonably priced.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't crazy about them at first... but after a few sessions they started to fit to my feet and the traction improved too. Now it's one of the best feeling bball shoes i've worn. Good bouncy cushion, support, traction, comfort, style...it's all there. Definitely reccomend. Just be aware of a break-in period.

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Zoom Rize Tb Fitness Shoes
feature_bullets: Mid-top height offers a collar placement that contains without sacrificing mobility.
Padded inner collar enhances comfort throughout play.
Zoom Air in the forefront provides responsive cushion for impact absorption and bounce.
Rubber outsole delivers traction and stability.
